item.title: How to make an annoucement on server?
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

Basicly all you have to do is look at you ::yell command if you have one, anyway

i have taken the liberty of preparing announce for you

Step 1: open client.java

Step 2: Search for if (command (this will take you to your first command)

Step 3: Add this command (its not hard to find out where…)

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“announce”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
try {

		String announcement = command.substring(9);
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll ="[~!()ANNOUNCEMENT()!~]: "+command.substring(9);

		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage("Wrong syntax! Use ::announce [YOURANNOUNCEMENT].");
		}

}[/code]

Best Of Wishes
—The Dark Abbys—[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2008, 09:44:13 PM[/size][hr][quote=“bender4, post:2, topic:194215”]::smsg

system message[/quote]
